scripts.css: npm run sass && postcss --use css-mqpacker --use autoprefixer -o style/main.css style/main.css
scripts.watch: npm run html:watch & npm run sass:watch & npm run js:watch
scripts.build: npm run html & npm run css & npm run js
scripts.servers: npm run server & npm run live-reload
scripts.dev: npm run watch & npm run servers
scripts.dev:server: npm run watch & npm run server
scripts.minify: npm run minify:css & npm run minify:js
scripts.export:css: postcss --use css-mqpacker --use autoprefixer --use cssnano -o export/style/main.css style/main.css
scripts.export:js: npm run js && npm run minify:js && mv scripts/main.min.js export/scripts/main.js
scripts.export:assets: cp -r images/ export/images & cp -r misc/ export/misc & cp favicon.ico export/ & cp apple-touch-icon.png export/
scripts.export: npm run export:html && npm run export:css && npm run export:js && npm run export:assets
